about_the_game:
Fight the Sunless Tide!


The light of the sun has not graced the Karavi lands in two centuries. Blighted by the Darkreign storm, three factions now vie for control of the Karavi throne, willing to slaughter all who oppose them. Meanwhile, the vile branded gnaw at the edges of their territory, ready to usher in an age of darkness that will last forever! Hundreds of lords prepare their hosts for battle, as the winds above roar across the lands!

Take Command!


As a lord of one of the warring realms, you can recruit soldiers to your cause, who will spill their blood to advance your ambitions! For each victory you attain, your prestige grows, allowing you to demand more funds from your throne. But beware, for defeat will dull your position of power, and too many failures will see you dead amongst your soldiers!

Show no mercy!


Your enemies also field lords to advance their plans, both to defend their claims and to expand their territory. Just as lords weaken with each defeat, their realm also fades as their armies shrink in power. Push every advantage, and leave your enemies reeling, unable to defend. Press onwards to their capital city, and claim it as your own to cut off all reinforcements to their remaining forces!

content_descriptors.notes: Lords of the Darkreign takes place in a bleak time in Ciel's history. Slavery (both for sex and labor), Racism, and the sacrifice of mortals are an almost daily occurrence, and the catastrophic war that is the game's subject matter has already claimed thousands of lives. The player can, and likely will, commit actions over the course of a campaign that will lead to the death of entire villages, and perhaps even capital cities, civilians and soldiers alike. Additionally, the concepts of genocide/ethnocide, and ethnic replacement, are some of the driving forces behind the warring factions, as the bitterness between the races that inhabit the Karavi lands has exploded into civil war. Blood and gore are also minor features of the game's art. Although we feel like these concepts enhance the story of Ciel, they are clearly not for everyone. Please consider these factors before purchasing/playing the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3630Qm CPU @ 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio
  • Additional Notes: True minimum specs might be much lower than this. This is the lowest Specifications we had available when testing. Internet connection will be required to play multiplayer when it is added.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6402P CPU @ 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio
  • Additional Notes: As the game has very low-end graphics at this stage, almost all reasonably modern computers should be able to run Lords of the Darkreign well. In its current state, a faster processor will allow faster auto-battle computations, leading to less downtime. However, when manual battles are added, better graphics capabilities will likely be preferential. In any case, our goal is to make the game perform well on a wide variety of hardware, so let us know if you run into issues! Multiplayer will require an internet connection when it is implemented.

short_description: Descend into the sunless lands! A three-way civil war ravages the realm, while an enigmatic order tries to conquer all for their draconic master. Take the role of a lord leading an army, and bring triumph to your cause! Annihilate all who defy you, and stand alone beneath the swirling sky!
